actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.
Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: To amend the Ethics Reform Act of 1989 to delay the 25 percent pay increase for Members of Congress and other officials until the Gramm-Rudman-Hollings deficit reduction target for Fiscal Year 1992 is met.

summary.text: Amends the Ethics Reform Act of 1989 to delay the 25 percent pay increase for Members of the House of Representatives and other Federal officials until the reduction target for FY 1992 under the Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficit Control Act of 1985 (Gramm-Rudman-Hollings Act) is met.

titles.title: To amend the Ethics Reform Act of 1989 to delay the 25 percent pay increase for Members of Congress and other officials until the Gramm-Rudman-Hollings deficit reduction target for Fiscal Year 1992 is met.
